primary_trope.name: extreme_prestige
primary_trope.hook_text: Only a handful of races score 5/5 on Prestige. USA Cycling Gravel Nationals is one.
primary_trope.mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) — knowing a perfect score exists but not why triggers dopamine anticipation.

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: We gave USA Cycling Gravel Nationals the verdict: The Stars and Stripes. Elite tier. 63 out of 100. Let me tell you what that really means.
beats.text_on_screen: USA Cycling Gravel Nationals: The Stars and Stripes
beats.visual: Verdict badge slam + tier badge + avatar

broll_sources.query: La Crescent, Minnesota (2025-26); previously Gering, Nebraska (2023-24) drone
La Crescent, Minnesota (2025-26); previously Gering, Nebraska (2023-24) landscape

beats.editing_note: Open with verdict like a boxing title card. Avatar with villain energy. Music: ominous build. PROMISE the viewer they'll learn the real story.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap + cognitive dissonance (verdict vs expectation).

beats.label: WHAT THEY TELL YOU
beats.narration: Here's the pitch. What the website wants you to believe.
beats.visual: Marketing highlights overlay — strengths as bullet points

broll_sources.query: USA Cycling Gravel Nationals official trailer
USA Cycling Gravel Nationals promo video

beats.editing_note: Read strengths in an exaggerated 'promotional voice.' Avatar side-eyes camera. Bright, clean visuals — this is the 'too good to be true' section. CONTRAST PATTERN: this calm section sets up the burst at 0:50.

strengths: National championship with UCI Worlds pathway
Open entry—anyone with USA Cycling membership can race for stars and stripes
Growing festival atmosphere with regional community support

beats.label: WHAT THEY DON'T TELL YOU
beats.narration: Now the stuff that doesn't make the brochure.
beats.visual: Red flag overlay — weaknesses with warning icons

broll_sources.query: USA Cycling Gravel Nationals course preview
gravel cycling Driftless 'champagne gravel' and punchy blufftop climbs

beats.editing_note: BURST SEQUENCE at 0:50 transition (pattern interrupt). 5-10 quick cuts: meme reaction, avatar facepalm, red overlay flash, warning sound. Then settle into analysis. Each weakness gets its own visual card + avatar reaction.

weaknesses: Young event still establishing reputation and course consistency
Venue has already moved (Gering to La Crescent) creating uncertainty
Midwest location lacks 'destination' appeal of coastal or mountain races

beats.label: THE NUMBERS DON'T LIE
beats.narration: The scores that tell the real story. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Low altitude. Breathe easy. La Crescent sits at Mississippi River valley elevation—basically sea level for anyone who's raced above 5,000 feet. Climate. 2 out of 5. Mostly pleasant. Check the forecast anyway. Logistics. 3 out of 5. Gets the job done. Nothing fancy. La Crescent is a 315-person town hosting 42 categories of national championship racers—the math doesn't add up for seamless operations.
beats.visual: Score cards — lowest 3 dimensions with explanations
beats.editing_note: RE-ENGAGEMENT BEAT — this is the ~2 min mark. Start with the least bad score, escalate to worst. Each score reveal: brief silence (0.5s), then number slams in. Avatar reaction scales with how bad the score is. Von Restorff: visually isolate the worst score (different color, bigger text, longer hold). [RIFF HERE] after the worst score reveal.

beats.label: THE BOTTOM LINE
beats.narration: If you want a legitimate shot at a national championship jersey and UCI Worlds qualification, this is your open-entry pathway. Bring climbing legs for the Driftless.
beats.editing_note: PAYOFF. Close the open loop from the hook. Avatar delivers final take directly to camera. End ABRUPTLY — never signal 'we're wrapping up.' MrBeast rule: cut to CTA mid-energy.

beats.label: CTA
beats.narration: Full breakdown. All 14 dimensions. Free prep kit. Link in bio.
beats.editing_note: Keep energy up. Don't wind down.
beats.engagement_question: Roast or defend USA Cycling Gravel Nationals. Go.

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic pose, 'USA Cycling Gravel Nationals' bold text, tier badge 'ELITE', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.youtube: Primary platform. Enable mid-roll ads if >8 min.
cross_platform_notes.extract_shorts: Pull 3-5 Short clips from hot take moments within 48hrs.
cross_platform_notes.twitter_x: Post the most controversial data point as a standalone take.

production_checklist: [ ] B-roll sourced (check broll_sources in each beat)
[ ] Music track selected (check BPM targets per beat)
